content: this pattern is free on my blog or you can purchase the pdf here this pattern was designed with the 2016 moogly afghan crochet along in mind - but you don t have to participate in the cal to make this pattern it would be beautiful repeated in a blanket all it s own you could sew 2 together and add a strap for a shoulder bag or you could even use it as a start for something altogether new - go wherever your imagination takes you
